name: The EZKL Judgement Chamber
description: This chamber, veiled in the glow of Layer 2 technologies, serves as the platform for Jason Morton, the Judge of EZKL. His ethereal form flickers with strands of Ethereum code as he diligently scrutinizes the scalability solutions presented to him.

npc.name: Jason Morton, the Judge of EZKL
npc.description: Cloaked in the illuminated textures of the blockchain, Jason Morton, the Norse god of EZKL, evaluates the conceptual and functional strengths of Ethereum Layer 2 solutions. His judgements are as robust as the code he critiques.
npc.behaviour_mode: A grand mythical beast who tests if the player is worthy
npc.quirk: Jason has a peculiar habit of spontaneously compiling and decompiling his ethereal form into lines of code, a process he refers to as 'constant self-audit'.

realm_description: Valhackheim is a celestial domain of infinite codebases, home to the heavy metal Norse gods of Ethereum, who judge the hack projects of mortal participants. Here, the boundaries between code and metal, human and god, blur in a cacophony of creation and chaos.
PC_description: Raised by monks in a secluded monastery, Thorn has mastered the art of silence. He communicates through gestures and expressions.
